question: After being involved in an accident, you were looked after by a person you did not know before. Write a special thank you letter to express your gratitude.In your letter:Introduce yourself and let him/her know why you are writingExpress your appreciationAnd offer him/ her to visit your home with this family.
text: I am writing this letter to express my deepest gratitude to you as you took undeniable care of me in my most vulnerable time in life.

Let me start by presenting myself. I was in a car accident two weeks ago, when we first met. I was barely conscious at the time, because I had been reached by a vehicle that crossed the stop sign, and you were there to help me, even without knowing me.

I would like to be able to demonstrate how thankful I am for your care at that moment, but I am afraid I do not have enough words. Although I did not have any serious injuries, your gesture helped me to be where I am now, alive and well.
Finally, I would be trouled if you and your family could come to visit my house for dinner. I was wondering if next Friday, around 6 pm,  would be good for you.
I look forward to hearing from you soon.
